definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Dont doubt about this though they state themselves antitheists.
sentences.chinese: 不要怀疑，虽说他们都是无神论者。

sentences.english: And that will be no pleasant sight, " said Baloo ."
sentences.chinese: 虽说那将是不愉快的事。

sentences.english: He was by no means a tidyman, buthe had no wish to bring any trace of the autopsy room home on his shoes.
sentences.chinese: 虽说没有洁癖，但绝不希望有这些被粘在鞋上带回家。

sentences.english: She has a very good notion of fingering, though her taste is not equal to Anne's.
sentences.chinese: 虽说她的趣味比不上安妮，可是她很懂得指法。

sentences.english: Although there is a language barrier, Master Yang and Scot have met many times already.
sentences.chinese: 虽说语言不通，杨老师和格瑞已经切磋多次了。

sentences.english: Mothers- and daughters-in-law are supposed to be family, yet they don't know each other well.
sentences.chinese: 婆婆和媳妇虽说理应是一家人，但双方并不怎么熟悉。

sentences.english: Public areas are lovely, all leather armchairs and open fire.
sentences.chinese: 虽说公共场所很有趣，全皮扶椅和炉火。

sentences.english: Though time may have everything, but because the baptism, you won't fade, beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 虽说时间会洗礼一切，但是因为有你，美好不会退色。

sentences.english: Although non-original, but the quality is very good.
sentences.chinese: 虽说非原版，但画质还是很好。

sentences.english: The different accidents of life are not so changeable as the feelings of human nature.
sentences.chinese: 虽说世事无常，可是再怎么也没有人类的情感多变了。

sentences.english: The two agendas sit in tension, but they are not contradictory.
sentences.chinese: 虽说这两个政党剑拔弩张，但是他们并不矛盾。

sentences.english: Buenos Aires, Argentina - A long plane ride away, but worth every minute.
sentences.chinese: 虽说要飞很长一段时间，但是每分钟都是值得的。

sentences.english: Though be legend, the every time rise and fall of Dan Shiyu column is accompanying dispute.
sentences.chinese: 虽说是传奇，但史玉柱的每一次起落都伴随着争议。

sentences.english: It wasn't the funniest but I liked it.
sentences.chinese: 虽说它并不特别有趣，但是我喜欢它。

sentences.english: Though he was clever, he couldn't conceal his eagerness for praise.
sentences.chinese: 虽说他很聪明，却不能掩饰他亟于获得赞扬的神情。

sentences.english: This Hotpot restaurant may not be authentic, but it has a good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 这家火锅城虽说不敢说是正宗的，但都说这儿好。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
to appear to be/to seem as if
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
